metadata.title: CVE-2024-5197

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP6

metadata.description: There exists interger overflows in libvpx in versions prior to 1.14.1.?Calling vpx_img_alloc()?with a large value of the d_w, d_h, or align?parameter may result in integer overflows in the calculations of buffer sizes and offsets and some fields of the returned vpx_image_t?struct may be invalid.?Calling vpx_img_wrap()?with a large value of the d_w, d_h, or stride_align?parameter may result in integer overflows in the calculations of buffer sizes and offsets and some fields of the returned vpx_image_t?struct may be invalid. We recommend upgrading to version 1.14.1 or beyond
